dtoverlay=dpi24-gpi

disable_overscan=1
#disable_splash=1
hdmi_drive=1
dtparam=audio=off
disable_fw_kms_setup=1

# Disable the ACT LED on the Pi Zero
dtparam=act_led_trigger=none
dtparam=act_led_activelow=on
